languages.text: "Я всегда рада песням твоим, ибо они умерщвляют дух не хуже самоистязаний. Приступай, я... готова".

traits.locale_text: "Я всегда рада песням твоим, ибо они умерщвляют дух не хуже самоистязаний. Приступай, я... готова".

languages.text: "I always welcome your recitals, for they are as deadening to the spirit as self-infliction. Proceed... I am ready."

languages.text: «Siempre agradezco sus recitales, pues son tan sofocantes para el espíritu como las autolesiones. Proceda. Estoy... lista».
languages.original_text: "I always welcome your recitals, for they are as deadening to the spirit as self-infliction. Proceed... I am ready."

languages.text: 「あなたの独奏会はいつでも歓迎します。自傷行為と同じぐらい、精神を削いでくれるものなので。続けてください。準備は…できています」
languages.original_text: "I always welcome your recitals, for they are as deadening to the spirit as self-infliction. Proceed... I am ready."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの独奏会はいつでも歓迎します。自傷行為と同じぐらい、精神を削いでくれるものなので。続けてください。準備は…できています」

languages.text: “我一直都很喜欢听你念诗，因为这就像是在自我折磨一样，可以麻木我的精神。继续吧……我准备好了。”
languages.original_text: "I always welcome your recitals, for they are as deadening to the spirit as self-infliction. Proceed... I am ready."

traits.locale_text: “我一直都很喜欢听你念诗，因为这就像是在自我折磨一样，可以麻木我的精神。继续吧，我……准备好了。”

languages.text: "Ich liebe Eure Vorträge, denn sie sind für den Verstand ebenso abstumpfend wie Selbstgeißelung. Fahrt fort ... Ich bin bereit."
languages.original_text: "I always welcome your recitals, for they are as deadening to the spirit as self-infliction. Proceed... I am ready."

traits.locale_text: "Ich liebe Eure Vorträge, denn sie sind für den Verstand ebenso abstumpfend wie Selbstgeißelung. Fahrt fort. Ich bin ... bereit."

languages.text: « Je me réjouis toujours de vos récitals, car ils sont aussi engourdissants pour l'esprit que l'autoflagellation. Allez-y. Je… J'attends. »

languages.text: "Tasvirlerinin her daim başımın üzerinde yeri var. Zira şahsi eziyet kadar ruhu sağırlaştıran bir etkileri var. Devam et... Hazırım."
languages.original_text: "I always welcome your recitals, for they are as deadening to the spirit as self-infliction. Proceed... I am ready."
